question: As per the Times Higher Education (THE) World University Ranking (WUR) 2021, which is the only Indian institution to be in the list of top 350 varsities?
explanation:
In the Times Higher Education (THE) World University Ranking (WUR) 2021, a total of 63 universities from India qualified for the ranking, whereas none could make it to the top 300.
Indian Institute of Science (IISc) has been placed in the “Rank: 301 – 350” category and is the only Indian institution to be listed in the top 350 institutions. China’s Tsinghua University becomes the first-ever Asian university to make the overall top 20.
